title: 4 dead in Oklahoma after dad kills kids, their mom,...
text:
Police in southwest Oklahoma say four people are dead after a father shot his two children and their mother, then himself.

Lawton police Sgt. Tim Jenkins said Wednesday that Russell Cliburn fatally shot Krystle Easley, Emma Cliburn and Kristo Cliburn on Saturday afternoon at a home on the east side of the city, about 75 miles (121 kilometers) southwest of Oklahoma City.

Jenkins said police have not confirmed the ages of the four, but said Russell Cliburn and Easley - a special education teacher for Lawton Public Schools - are the parents and the children were younger than 10.

The Associated Press reported Jenkins said the parents of Russell Cliburn witnessed the shooting, but are shaken and have not been able to provide a motive. However Cliburn's brother on Saturday claimed the shooter had been involved in an altercation which led to the shooting.

Russell Cliburn fatally shot Krystle Easley, Emma Cliburn and Kristo Cliburn (pictured) on Saturday at a home on the east side of the Oklahoma City

Father-of-two, Cilburn, then turned the gun on himself in front of his parents at their home

'Today, my brother and his ex-girlfriend got into an argument at my parents’ house. We don’t know why, but it escalated and my brother snapped. He shot the ex-girlfriend, their two children, and himself,' Justin C. Cliburn posted on Facebook. 'We have no idea why. We’re heartbroken, angry, sorry, and confused. We’re angry he took away our niece, nephew, and grandchildren.'

According to her Facebook profile, Easley had one of her children with the man - known as 'Red' - five years ago in April 2014.

Justin added an apology to the woman's family as he acknowledged his brother's actions.

The former couple was arguing according to his brother's Facebook post on the day of the tragedy

The shooter's brother apologized for his sibling's actions in a Facebook post where he said he was 'angry' and 'confused'

Police confirmed the children are both under 10 years old and according to Facebook Easley had one child five years ago in 2014

'We’re devastated for Krystle’s family. We’re sorry for what he did, even as we could do nothing to stop it,' Justin continued. 'We’re heartbroken to lose our brother and son, regardless of the circumstances. And we’re confused and in shock by it all. Please respect our family’s privacy, and refrain from liking, commenting, texting, etc. for right now.'

The sister of Easley bawled in a video obtained by KSWO as she revealed she learned about the loss of her sibling and nieces after her little brother called.

'I couldn’t believe it. I didn’t want to believe it. I guess I don’t understand how a man can look his children in the face and take his children’s lives like that,' Amanda Adams cried.

Michael said in a GoFundMe page set up to help with funeral costs: 'My sister and her beautiful babies were abruptly taken away from us on 10-5-19. We are raising money for their funeral and/or memorial.

'The funds will also be for family that is far off that cannot make it without help. We have a large family and many of us are away for work. We appreciate all/any help you may provide.'
description: Russell Cliburn fatally shot his ex-girlfriend Krystle Easley and their children Emma Cliburn and Kristo Cliburn on Saturday at his parents' home on the east side of the Oklahoma City.
